group_1.textCenter: …This fissure…just like I thought…@Its unevenness means there'll be disaster…
Today, I can move pretty well…@At least, right now I can…
I can do it… I can do it… I can…
(I didn't think…just walking around@would be this hard…)
(But…I gotta move while I still can…)

group_1.textRight: Lady Toyo!@What are you doing here?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]AH!

group_1.textRight: S-sorry, I didn't mean to shout like that…
The queen herself ordered me to be@your guard, milady.
Now, let's head back.@It's not safe here.

group_1.textLeft: B-but… I'm…

group_1.textRight: What are you doing there?!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Lady Toyo stepped outside, so I followed.

group_1.textRight: What, haven't you heard?
It's not safe here.@Lady Toyo needs to be relocated.

group_1.textLeft: That's the first I've heard of it…

group_1.textRight: Ugh, come on, quit fussing!@These are Lady Himiko's orders!
C'mon already!@Get out of here!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes sir…
…Wh-what the heck…?

group_1.textRight: Well, that did the trick.

group_1.textLeft: No way… You…@You can change your appearance, Rena?

group_1.textRight: It's not just my appearance.
It's…a special magic that gives me the power@to change myself.
…So I won't give in to despair.

group_1.textLeft: You won't give in to duh-spare…?

group_1.textRight: And you can't give in to despair either, right?
You're worried about the village, so even though@your body is failing you…
Even if we try stopping you…you're still gonna@go, right? To that village with the canal.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I wanna protect that place.

group_1.textRight: I knew you would say that.

group_1.textLeft: K-Kaede…? Where did you go…?

group_1.textRight: Where did I go…?
I was rushing to finish the palanquin!

group_1.textLeft: The…palla-what?

group_1.textRight: You mean they weren't in this era either? It's like@a stretcher… Which, uh, you still wouldn't know.
Well, basically, we can take you anywhere@with this thing!

group_1.textLeft: When did you make that…?

group_1.textRight: Ehehe… We've been working on it even since@you got sick.
We were talking about what we could do@for you, and we decided to build this.
I'm so glad we could get it done…
…It's boring to be stuck bedridden@at home, y'know?
We were just making this for a change of pace,@but I never thought we'd have to use it here.

group_1.textLeft: You guys…made this for me…

group_1.textRight: Alright, c'mon, let's get you in!@We'll carry you to the village!

group_1.textLeft: G-got it…!

group_1.textRight: Alright, here we go!
Hang on a sec…@What d'you mean you're gonna die?
…Your Majesty.

group_1.textLeft: It's alright…@You may stand back.

group_1.textRight: Yes, ma'am…

group_1.textLeft: …Now, what I'm about to tell you is to be known@to only a select few.
You mustn't tell anyone, not even Toyo.

group_1.textRight: …Are you sick or something?

group_1.textLeft: Lately I've been coughing up blood every day,
and any light has become unbearably bright…
…My vision has failed, and I can only see faintly.

group_1.textRight: It might pass, though…

group_1.textLeft: …Perhaps showing you will convince you.

group_1.textRight: *Gasp*

group_1.textLeft: It's especially bad around the face…@…Forgive me. I've shown you something ugly.

group_1.textRight: No, it's fine…

group_1.textLeft: And that's only the beginning of my woes…
All those stricken with these terrible ailments@at the same time have inevitably perished.
Hence I will die as well.

group_1.textRight: …You still don't know that for sure though.
Now I see.

group_1.textLeft: Nemu?!

group_1.textRight: Himiko of Yamatai will perish in the midst@of war against Kuna…
This is written in history.

group_1.textLeft: That's…
…In any case, I must hurry.
Toyo's health grows worse by the day…@What will become of her if I were to die now?
We must resolve this war while I still live…

group_1.textRight: …So that's why you rushed into this war…

group_1.textLeft: For Toyo's sake.
…Waging war for a child's sake is unbefitting@of a proper ruler…
And so when this war ends,@I shall atone for it with my death.
Having my head should satisfy the people@somewhat…
I regret that my life will be so short-lived,@but alas.

group_1.textRight: Why would you do all this?

group_1.textLeft: …You'll understand my reasons when you@become a mother.
We made it!

group_1.textRight: Nuwaaaah… That was so fast…

group_1.textLeft: A-are you okay, Toyo?

group_1.textRight: Just feeling dizzy, that's all.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, there's the enemy soldiers!

group_1.textRight: [chara:834400:effect_7000_attack01]Take this!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:834400:effect_7002_damage01][se:3001_chara_damage][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Kuh…!

group_1.textRight: Go! Attack!
Wh-what's going on…

group_1.textLeft: It's a total battlefield…
Look! The villagers!

group_1.textRight: W-we gotta save 'em…!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, cut that out!@You can't do that right now!

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, I'll evacuate the villagers!

group_1.textLeft: It's all you!

group_1.textRight: *Pant…!* *Pant…!*

group_1.textLeft: Y-you see?! That's why you shouldn't try moving@by yourself!

group_1.textRight: I-I need you to bring me to the canal…

group_1.textLeft: But…

group_1.textRight: We made it this far…@I won't give up now.
